name: Dexter Morgan
quote: Sometimes, I wonder what it would be like for everything inside me that's denied and unknown to be revealed. But I'll never know. I live my life in hiding. My survival depends on it.
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Debra Morgan
quote: Dex, you are all the family that I have, and I barely know you. So, if you're going to eat steaks with somebody after a rough day, somebody's going to break through your fucking walls, I think it should be me! I think I have earned it!
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Vincent Masuka
quote: I got a reputation to live up to: I mean, if my show doesn't make people vomit and have an e******n at the same time, then I've let my audience down.
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Angel Batista
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: James Doakes
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Harry Morgan
quote: When I'm gone I won't be able to stop you from being who you are. Sooner or later you'll need to do it. Just remember our lessons.
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Maria LaGuerta
quote: I lost a relationship because of this job and I take great comfort in the pure objectivity of numbers… Improve your numbers and everything will change, I promise you.”
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Rita Morgan
quote: I can’t help it. I kill things.
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Joey Quinn
quote: I do dumb things. I’m a dumb guy. But the one thing I did right was to get you to almost like me.
affiliation: Miami Metro Police Department (Miami Metro Homicide)

name: Arthur Mitchell
quote: You can't control the demon inside of you any more than I could control mine.
